headline: Hilton (HLT) Margin Expansion Challenges Bullish Narratives on Profit Sustainability
summary: Hilton Worldwide Holdings (HLT) reported another strong year of earnings growth, with profitability expanding at an annualized rate of 46.8% over the past five years. Net profit margins now stand at 32.9%, up from 26.2% last year, while earnings climbed 31.3% in the latest twelve months. Although revenue is forecast to grow at 8.4% per year and earnings at 14.44%, both projections slightly lag the broader US market’s expected growth rates. Investors appear to be weighing impressive historical...

headline: HLT Q3 Deep Dive: Development Acceleration and Cost Controls Offset RevPAR Weakness
summary: Hotel company Hilton (NYSE:HLT) reported Q3 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 8.8% year on year to $3.12 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.11 per share was 3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
